name: Corviknight
description: This Pokémon reigns supreme in the skies of the Galar region. The black luster of its steel body could drive terror into the heart of any foe.

attacks.name: Iron Wings
attacks.effect: You may discard 2 Energy from this Pokémon. If you do, during your opponent’s next turn, this Pokémon takes 100 less damage from attacks (after applying Weakness and Resistance).
